content.text:
K? - Strange World
transcribed by Stefano Serafin (stefano.serafin@libero.it)

I was very surprised when I found this song had not been transcribed yet.
Here's the chords & lyrics.

Notes -
* Tune your guitar one half step lower than usual.
* Not sure about the lyrics - I'm italian and my english is very poor.

| [ch]Am[/ch] | [ch]Dm[/ch] | [ch]G[/ch] | [ch]Am[/ch] | - 2 times

[Verse]
[ch]Am[/ch]                  [ch]Dm[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]Am[/ch]
   Is this our last chance to say all we have to say
   [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]Dm[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]Am[/ch]
   Hiding here inside ourselves we live our lives afraid
       [ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]Dm[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]Am[/ch]
   So close you eyes and just believe in everything you're told
        [ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]Dm[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]Am[/ch]
   'Cos in this land of bright confusion it's easy to give up control

[Chorus]
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]F[/ch]
   Strange world - People talk and tell only lies
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Am[/ch]
   Strange world - People kill an eye for an eye
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]                  [ch]F[/ch]
   Strange world - Dream one day we'll see the light
[ch]Am[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]                              [ch]Am[/ch]
   Strange world - Believe and everything will be alright

[Verse]
                [ch]Dm[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]Am[/ch]
   This is the plage where everything begins and ends
     [ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]Dm[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]
   Again; no secrets left to hide, no seven deadly sins
         [ch]Am[/ch]                 [ch]Dm[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]
   This world that we have wasted has kept us very well
          [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]Dm[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]Am[/ch]
   When science now is sacred, who will save us from ourselves

[Chorus]
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]
   Strange world - People talk and tell only lies
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Am[/ch]
   Strange world - People kill an eye for an eye
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]                  [ch]F[/ch]
   Strange world - Dream one day we'll see the light
[ch]Am[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]                              [[ch]Am[/ch]
   Strange world - Believe and everything will be alright

| [ch]Am[/ch] | [ch]Dm[/ch] | [ch]G[/ch] | [ch]Am[/ch] | - 4 times (violin solo)

[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]              [ch]F[/ch]
   Strange world - People talk, sometimes I wonder why
            [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Am[/ch]                                   [ch]F[/ch]
   Strange world - People cursed and no one hears their cry
            [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]               [[ch]F[/ch]
   Strange world - Burning spotless tears out of my eye

| [ch]F[/ch] | [ch]G[/ch] | [ch]Em[/ch] | [ch]F[/ch] |


[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Am[/ch]
   Strange world - People talk and tell only lies
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]             [ch]F[/ch]
   Strange world - People kill an eye for an eye
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Am[/ch]
   Strange world - Dream one day we'll see the light

Play | [ch]F[/ch] | [ch]G[/ch] | [ch]Em[/ch] | [ch]F[/ch]  |
     | [ch]F[/ch] | [ch]G[/ch] | [ch]Am[/ch] | [ch]Am[/ch] | ad libitum while singing:

   Strange world, people kill and people hail and people talk and people kill
   And still I wonder, wonder why...

That's it - enjoy
             Stefano
